page.title: 07POPULATION OF M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: The total population within our allovated grid reference is approximately 2l00. We split the total into 4 age groups: 0-24 years - 808; 25-44 years - 3ll; 45-64 years - 540; 65-85+ years - 4l4. These figures show us that the area has a large proportion of young people and roughly equal numbers for the other age groups. Market Weighton obviously has a larger population than Shiptonthorpe; ratio of area is 4.6:l Taken from data from the l98l census for the Market Weighton Ward. The social classes are divided into 5 sections: (l) Professional - 30; (2) intermediate - 280; (3) Skilled, non manual - 200, Skilled,manual - 350; (4) Partly skilled - l90; and (5) Unskilled - 20.
